entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (25)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (25)20141208
We did two levels on the Star Road and just have one left. We
played the last one for quite a while and had a very hard time at
it.

Total time: 28:04

  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (4)
entry.content:
Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (4)20141207
I played this for about three hours. I completed a lot of levels,
although didn't do any remix levels. My main thought after playing
so many levels is to reflect on how terribly controlling a lot of
these early games are. They are just such frustrating garbage
compared to even games like SMB1. Wow. Ice Climbers was
particularly bad.

--

I played a second session for about thirty minutes. I mostly
played Clu Clu Land, which is really bizarre. It controls okay,
but it is a very non-intuitive game. It's very unique though.

Total time: 4:42
  • Video Games
  • NES Remix
  • WiiU
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (24)
entry.content:

particularly hard, but they all had their moments of pain and joy.

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (23)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (23)20141206
We played for about three and a half hours. We beat the game and
played the first two Super Star Road levels. The final level
wasn't as cool as the final level of the last game, but it was
really fun. The Star Road levels are very hard. The second one
took us an incredibly long time to master and complete.

Total time: 25:52
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers U
  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (22)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (22)20141205
We played for about two hours and finished Meringue Clouds, plus
did a level of Peach's Castle and found a place to do some Turtle
Tipping to get 99 lives. It was very fun.

Total time: 22:28
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers U
  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 42 - Episode Eight
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 42 - Episode Eight20141202
This was a nice conclusion to a lot of the plot lines, although
in retrospect, I feel like this was a very weak season without a
lot of spectacles. I like the Rose is married, although I wonder
if that means she's off the show because she won't live with
them. Similarly, Tom is leaving. I'm very surprised that Anna was
arrested; hopefully it won't be drawn out because otherwise it's
the same plot as what happened to Bates.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (21)20141201

some trixy things to do to get coins.

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 40 - Episode Six
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 40 - Episode Six20141201
I feel very much for Edith, although she has been very abusive to
the Drewes. I like the way the problems are starting to
resolve. I thought that Thomas' problem was too subtle.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 41 - Episode Seven
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 41 - Episode Seven20141201
It was very cute how Violet reacted to Isobel's wedding plans. I
also find Rose and Atticus to be very cute.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 37 - Episode Three
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 37 - Episode Three20141130
I'm quite surprised by Mary's behavior as person, but not from a
meta-perspective on the show. I feel like they are really
dragging out the Mr Green situation.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 38 - Episode Four
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 38 - Episode Four20141130
I thought that Lord Merton was very cute with Isobel. I'm quite
worried about Thomas, I wonder if he's doing crazy drugs or
something. It was very funny how they picked on Molesley. Miss
Bunting is so annoying.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.content:

height of the season and tons of horrible things are going to
start happening as a consequence of their choices in this
episode. Ouch.
